modName: Old And Rusty - Nordic Round Shield
summary: This is a texture overhaul for the ingenious Nordic Round Shield by Fortran
descriptionHtml:

[/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=5][size=6][size=5]Old And Rusty - Nordic Round Shield[/size][/size]
[i][size=3]
Original:            Created by [/size][/i][/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=5][i][size=3]Fortran[/size][/i][/size][size=5][i][size=3][size=5][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][/size][size=3][i]a texture correction:        by [/i][/size][size=3][i]clauDA[/i][/size]


[/size][/i][/size][i][size=3]This is a texture overhaul for the ingenious Nordic Round Shield by Fortran.
I've reworked the texture, the shield belongs to Fortran, the rights remain with Fortran.

You need the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35664]original[/url] mod of Fortran.[/size][/i][i][size=3]
After downloading the ZIP file, unpack the archive
and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.
Overwrite the texture of the original.
Simple, for free . . .

You like it?  Do not forget to endorsed me  &  Fortran!
[/size][/i][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][i][size=3][size=3][i]

Thanks to all who have supported me so far...[/size]
